amendment.description: To provide for programs to help reduce the risk that prisoners will recidivate upon release from prison, and for other purposes.

vote.text: Amendment SA 4108 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 87 - 12. Record Vote Number: 271.

action.text: Considered by Senate (Message from the House considered).
Considered by Senate (Message from the House considered).

Amendment SA 4108 proposed by Senator McConnell for Senator Grassley. (consideration: CR S7566-7567) To provide for programs to help reduce the risk that prisoners will recidivate upon release from prison, and for other purposes.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 4108 proposed by Senator McConnell for Senator Grassley.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 4108 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 87 - 12. Record Vote Number: 271.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Amendment SA 4108 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 87 - 12. Record Vote Number: 271.
